alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 3:33PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central La Plata County through 400 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northeast of Durango, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Durango. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 550 in Colorado between mile markers 21 and 41. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 80 and 84. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
